scripts.build: cat web/src/lib/utils/Bag.js LF web/src/lib/utils/BitSet.js LF web/src/lib/utils/Class.js LF web/src/lib/utils/Map.js LF web/src/lib/utils/HashMap.js LF web/src/lib/utils/ImmutableBag.js LF web/src/lib/utils/UUID.js LF web/src/lib/prolog.js LF web/src/lib/Aspect.js LF web/src/lib/Component.js LF web/src/lib/ComponentType.js LF web/src/lib/Entity.js LF web/src/lib/EntityObserver.js LF web/src/lib/World.js LF web/src/lib/Manager.js LF web/src/lib/EntitySystem.js LF web/src/lib/ComponentMapper.js LF web/src/lib/EntityManager.js LF web/src/lib/ComponentManager.js LF web/src/lib/annotations/Mapper.js LF web/src/lib/managers/GroupManager.js LF web/src/lib/managers/PlayerManager.js LF web/src/lib/managers/TagManager.js LF web/src/lib/managers/TeamManager.js LF web/src/lib/systems/DelayedEntityProcessingSystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/EntityProcessingSystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/IntervalEntitySystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/VoidEntitySystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/IntervalEntityProcessingSystem.js LF web/src/lib/exports.js > build/artemis.js  && cat web/src/lib/utils/Bag.js LF web/src/lib/utils/BitSet.js LF web/src/lib/utils/Class.js LF web/src/lib/utils/Map.js LF web/src/lib/utils/HashMap.js LF web/src/lib/utils/ImmutableBag.js LF web/src/lib/utils/UUID.js LF web/src/lib/prolog.js LF web/src/lib/Aspect.js LF web/src/lib/Component.js LF web/src/lib/ComponentType.js LF web/src/lib/Entity.js LF web/src/lib/EntityObserver.js LF web/src/lib/World.js LF web/src/lib/Manager.js LF web/src/lib/EntitySystem.js LF web/src/lib/ComponentMapper.js LF web/src/lib/EntityManager.js LF web/src/lib/ComponentManager.js LF web/src/lib/annotations/Mapper.js LF web/src/lib/managers/GroupManager.js LF web/src/lib/managers/PlayerManager.js LF web/src/lib/managers/TagManager.js LF web/src/lib/managers/TeamManager.js LF web/src/lib/systems/DelayedEntityProcessingSystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/EntityProcessingSystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/IntervalEntitySystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/VoidEntitySystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/IntervalEntityProcessingSystem.js LF web/src/lib/exports.js | java -jar packages/closure-compiler/lib/vendor/compiler.jar --compilation_level WHITESPACE_ONLY --js_output_file build/artemis.min,js
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/* && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p build/web && mkdir -p build/lib
scripts.closure: npm run transpile && tools/convert && java -jar tools/plovr.jar build config.js
scripts.deploy: cp -rf web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -rf web/src ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/main.js ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/project.json ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
scripts.preandroid: npm run predeploy && npm run transpile && npm run resources && cp -fr web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
